mapper.select: select count(*) as cntUser from usertable
select to_char(join_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as join_date, sum(count(*)) over (order by join_date) as cntUser from (select join_date, id from usertable) group by join_date order by join_date
select count(*) from blog where to_char(blog_date,'YY/MM/DD') = to_char(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT count(t.travelge_name) as cnt, t.travelge_name as name FROM usertable U, avg_score A, travelge_info T WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = t.content_code and a.wish_list = 1 GROUP BY t.travelge_name UNION SELECT count(r.RESTAURANT_NAME) as cnt, R.RESTAURANT_NAME as name FROM usertable U, avg_score A, RESTAURANT R WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = r.content_code and a.wish_list = 1 GROUP BY r.RESTAURANT_NAME UNION SELECT count(L.LOOK_TITLE) as cnt, L.LOOK_TITLE as name FROM usertable U, avg_score A, LOOK_INFO L WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = L.content_code and a.wish_list = 1 GROUP BY L.LOOK_TITLE ORDER BY cnt desc

SELECT avg(a.score)as avg , count(a.score) as cnt ,t.travelge_name as name FROM usertable U, avg_score A, travelge_info T WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = t.content_code AND a.score is not null AND a.score != 0 GROUP BY t.travelge_name UNION SELECT avg(a.score)as avg,count(a.score) as cnt , R.RESTAURANT_NAME FROM usertable U, avg_score A, RESTAURANT R WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = r.content_code AND a.score is not null AND a.score != 0 GROUP BY r.RESTAURANT_NAME UNION SELECT avg(a.score)as avg,count(a.score) as cnt , L.LOOK_TITLE FROM usertable U, avg_score A, LOOK_INFO L WHERE U.ID = A.ID AND A.content_code = L.content_code AND a.score is not null AND a.score != 0 GROUP BY L.LOOK_TITLE ORDER BY avg desc, cnt desc
